about_the_game:
Project IO is a first-person, survival horror video game set in the late 1950's, with an emphasis on exploration and narrative. Players control a Journalist following up on a developing story at a new-age, high tech meat processing plant. With only a flashlight to help guide you through the recently abandoned facility, you must follow the clues to discover what happened at this once prestigious factory.

Play hide and seek like your life depended on it.
Use your surroundings to distract your enemies.
Stay calm, try not to run.
They might hear you....

Are you ready for the Genetic Renaissance?

Welcome to GEN-CO.

content_descriptors.notes: Project IO is a horror survival game set in an old abandoned meat processing plant, by nature - it does contain blood and gore. Project IO may contain language and violent references not suitable for all audiences.

Players control a Journalist following up on a developing story at a new-age, high tech meat processing plant. name: Project IO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1050 GT
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1080 GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Project IO is a first-person, survival horror video game set in the late 1950's, with an emphasis on exploration and narrative.
